'''Captain Daraku''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Daraku is a master watershaper and captain of ''Periki's Resolve''. He can be encountered before sailing to Ukaizo if the [Huana](/huana/) are the strongest rival.

In a [note](/darakusReply/) to [Guildmaster Mairu](/guildmasterMairu/) it is implied that he is in a relationship with [Queen Onekaza II](/queenOnekazaIi/).

'''Captain Daraku''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
Daraku is a master watershaper and captain of ''Periki's Resolve''. He can be encountered before sailing to Ukaizo if the [[Huana]] are the strongest rival.

In a [[Daraku's Reply|note]] to [[Guildmaster Mairu]] it is implied that he is in a relationship with [[Queen Onekaza II]].
